column3: Traffic;Published:------ A Starex car hit a road divider at 10.38 pm on 21 March 2019 at the scene Along Street 289 in Boeung Kok II
column5: Phnom Penh.------According to the people at the scene
column6: the car was driving at speed when it clipped the divider and went up and landed on the concrete. The driver quickly left the scene before traffic cops arrived.------After the incident
column7: Starex was taken away by the traffic police and the driver will face legal action when he claims it back. ------https://tvfb.news/article/19536
